title: JavaScript Fundamentals
description: Learn the core language of the web: variables, functions, objects, and ES6+ features.

title: Front-End Development with React
description: Build dynamic, component-based user interfaces using React and modern tooling.

title: Back-End Development with Node.js
description: Master server-side JavaScript, Express.js, and working with MongoDB via Mongoose.

title: Full-Stack Web Application Bootcamp
description: End-to-end web development: build, deploy and secure a MERN-stack application.

title: UI/UX Design Essentials
description: Principles of user interface and user experience design, prototyping in Figma and Adobe XD.

title: Digital Marketing Fundamentals
description: Explore SEO, social media, and content strategies to grow your brand online.

title: RESTful API Design with Express
description: Design, implement and secure RESTful endpoints using Express.js and JWT authentication.

title: GraphQL with Apollo Server
description: Build a GraphQL API from schema design to resolver implementation using Apollo Server.

title: Database Modeling and Relationships
description: Learn to model complex schemas, relationships, and indexing strategies in MongoDB.

title: Testing and Debugging in Node.js
description: Write unit and integration tests with Jest and debug Node.js applications effectively.

title: State Management with Redux
description: Implement predictable state containers in React applications using Redux and middleware.

title: Advanced CSS and Tailwind
description: Master modern CSS techniques and utility-first styling with Tailwind CSS.

title: Performance Optimization for Web Apps
description: Analyze and improve front-end and back-end performance for faster load and response times.

title: DevOps Essentials with Docker
description: Containerize applications, write Dockerfiles, and orchestrate with Docker Compose.

title: Serverless Architecture on AWS
description: Build and deploy serverless functions using AWS Lambda, API Gateway, and DynamoDB.

title: Progressive Web Apps
description: Create installable, offline-capable web apps with Service Workers and Manifest files.

title: Introduction to Programming
description: Get started with the fundamentals of programming: variables, control flow, and basic algorithms.

title: Graphic Design Basics
description: Learn the core principles of graphic design, color theory, and typography.

title: Marketing 101
description: An introductory course on marketing principles, audience segmentation, and campaign planning.
